Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Description: Number of result after search

Keyword.Name: InputAndImportInvoiceData
Keyword.Description: Payables Invoices - Input Invoice Data then Import it (Images\Customer\PayablesInvoices\InputAndImportInvoiceData.png)

Param.Name: sField1
Param.Description: Format must have 6 parameters: FieldName;CheckExist;CheckRequired;CheckReadOnly;Value;ErrorMessage - CheckExist = exist or NotExist, CheckRequired = Required or NotRequired, CheckReadOnly = ReadOnly or NotReadOnly, Value = null means by pass input, ErrorMessage = ErrorMessage if any or NotError, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sVerifyTotalAmount
Param.Description: Total Amount need to verify

Param.Name: sVerifyError
Param.Description: Verify Error after input all field about

Param.Name: sClickImport
Param.Description: Click on Import button

Param.Name: sVerifyToastMessage
Param.Description: Toast Message need to verify after click on Import button

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second
